name: Creepsville Hotel
description:
Wellcome to Creepsville Hotel! Enjoy your time here.

This is the first prototype of game, please share your experience and report any bugs you might find.

The game is a weird mix of bullet hell, puzzle and twin shooter. Please mind that this is an Alpha so everything can change in the final product.

Your name is Tom, and you just came to a mysterious hotel that is haunted by the evil spirit Aleister, to help the souls trapped in the hotel and finally be able to rest you must cleanse this evil.

Please consider supporting this project in:

https://www.patreon.com/creepsvillehotel
